snippet: Furious Juventus coach Antonio Conte dismissed alleged comments by AS Roma counterpart Rudi Garcia as "provincial" and "bar talk" on Sunday, adding more spice to the Serie A title race between the two sides....

headline.print_headline: Juve Coach Conte Fumes at 'Provincial' Garcia
headline.main: Juve Coach Conte Fumes at 'Provincial' Garcia

lead_paragraph: Furious Juventus coach Antonio Conte dismissed alleged comments by AS Roma counterpart Rudi Garcia as "provincial" and "bar talk" on Sunday, adding more spice to the Serie A title race between the two sides.
